gui

Class ShapeIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.ShapeIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.Icon

    public class ShapeIcon
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon
    The Class ShapeIcon. Marking shape is painted to icon with given color, shape, etc.
